Welcome, Doct is a health care related app which mainly focusses on the problems faced in everyday life.

 There are three basic features of this app-

 1)Search Doctors-This features searches the various categories of doctors in your nearby area using google maps
 2)Find Disease Based On The Symptoms-In this feature you can get an idea of the disease you might be suffering and its probability based on the symptoms experienced by the person ,your age and sex.
 3)Search Medicines-In this feature you can know the description of the various medicines available in market.
 
 Hope You Enjoy.
 (In the next versions you can expect to book appointments to the various doctors in your nearby areas)
